name: Gunnada
description:
This is my first project using assets I created myself imported into the Unity Engine!

Gunnada is about a virus that has taken over the planet as it tries to launch the world's nuclear missiles, killing all of humanity.

You are the only one who can stop them with your lovely ship! (That sadly is underequipped, requiring upgrades over time.)

Will you be able to get through the three areas of code and defeat the Staright?
